title: recompile all packages everytime I execute "go install"
body:
by **joe2010xtmf**: 
Same problem occurred when I installed go 1.1 rc1, but after I deleted "beta"
of my folder name, everything works fine. Howevery, it happens again after I installed
go 1.1 rc 2. I use "go install -v", and it lists all packages every time,
which means it compiles all packages no matter I modified source code or not.
